titles.title: Three-Time Loser Act of 1993
To mandate life imprisonment without release for drug traffickers or violent criminals convicted for a third offense.

bill.summary: 9/9/1993--Introduced. Three-Time Loser Act of 1993 - Mandates life imprisonment without release for a third conviction for a felony drug offense, crime of violence, or any combination thereof. (Current law provides such penalty for a third conviction for a felony drug offense.)
